thoughts: Is startled to find {PRONOUN/m_c/self} wading in the muck of a shadowed forest

Is shocked to find {PRONOUN/m_c/self} here and not StarClan
Just can't believe {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} ended up in the Dark Forest. Was StarClan not watching over c_n?
Is not surprised to find {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in the Dark Forest
Grumbles as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/look/looks} around the blackened trees, realizing {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} failed
